item.title: Introductions
item.description: What we’re about The Data for Democracy Lab @ UVA is a place to promote the use of data science for the common good. We aspire to a data science that is educative – working to ensure more people have access to the power of data, that is inclusive – emphasizing the value of diverse perspectives, experiences, and knowledge, and that is open – revealing the methods, models, and limits to all and allowing others to adapt, improve, or apply the work.
